required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Surgical Hand Antisepsis With Propan-ol-1 60% Per Rubbing and Scrubbing
clinical_study.official_title: Surgical Hand Antisepsis With Propan-ol-1 60% Per Rubbing and Scrubbing in Accordance With European Norm Regulation 12791

brief_summary.textblock: The present study evaluates the effects of to compare bactericidal efficacy using the reference antiseptic product propan-ol-1 60% using the hand rub method versus hand scrub method in order to test if pass the standard european norm 12791.

detailed_description.textblock: The investigators conducted a crossover clinical trial to evaluate the antiseptic effectiveness of preoperative surgical scrubbing using propan-ol-1 60% by rub and scrub. Samples will be taken from the hands of each volunteer after a surgical hands antiseptic.

study_design_info.masking_description: The samples will be sent to the laboratory with numbers.

primary_outcome.measure: Reduction of bacterial load immediately after hand scrub
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from bacterial load at 5 minutes.
primary_outcome.description: Participants will scrub the liquid vigorously from hand to the wrists according with the standard handrub procedure.

secondary_outcome.measure: Reduction of bacterial load after 3 hours of hand scrub
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from bacterial load at 3 hours.
secondary_outcome.description: Participants will scrub the liquid vigorously from hand to the wrists according with the standard handrub procedure after 3 hours

arm_group.description: Hand antisepsis by scrub using propan-ol-1 60%
Hand antisepsis by rub using propan-ol-1 60%

intervention.description: Surgical Hand scrubbing using P-1 of both hands using a sterile disposable surgical scrub brush with plastic bristles on one side and a foam sponge on the other side.
Surgical Hand rubbing using P-1 of both hands using a sterile disposable surgical scrub brush with plastic bristles on one side and a foam sponge on the other side.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants without systemic pathologies, with healthy skin of the hands and short fingernails.
- They do not use substances with antibacterial action.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Taken antibiotics before 10 days of the intervention.
- Wear any jewellery on the hands.

overall_official.last_name: Ricardo Becerro de Bengoa Vallejo, PhD

patient_data.ipd_description: A number will be assigned to each participant
